english.segment1: Stop now. Im overreaching. Once again I think Im in the right. Im trying too hard to let go. How can I let you lead me. If Im a broken satellite. Wandering out on my own
english.segment2: We draw the lines. And we cross them too. We dont know what weve done. But its what we do. Dying to become more like You
english.segment3: I never meant to disrespect you. But thats exactly what Ive done. What am I trying to prove. When will I stop and trust you. I know that youre the only one. How am I blind to the truth
english.segment4: We draw the lines. And we cross them too. We dont know what weve done. But its what we do. Dying to become more like You
